## What governance covers

Governance defines:
- how you propose changes,
- how you version them,
- how you deprecate safely,
- what guarantees users can rely on.

This is what keeps AKSDB v2 coherent as it grows.

## Governance principle (default)

Prefer:
- additive changes,
- explicit deprecations,
- compatibility notes per release,
over silent breaking changes.
